text: asmaano aur zameen ki paidayish, raath din ka her pher, kashtiyo ka logo ko nafa dene waali chizo ko liye hoye samandar mein chalna, asmaan se paani utaar kar, murda zamin ko zinda kar dena, is mein har qism ke jaanwaro ko phaila dena, hawaao ke ruq badalna, aur baadal jo asmaan aur zameen ke darmiyaan musaqqar hai, in mein aqal mandu ke liye khudrath ilaahi ki nishaniya hai
